content/output/news.json.text: Visit Rome, Barcelona, and London for Guest Talk
Attend [**CHI 2023**](https://chi2023.acm.org/) in Hamburg to present two full-papers and two late-breaking work
Three papers were submitted to R&R for [**CHI 2023**](https://chi2023.acm.org/)
Mehrad Faridan and Marcus Friedel won Honorable Mention Award for [**UIST 2022**](https://uist.acm.org/uist2022/) Student Innovation Contest
Final Day for the Mitacs Globalink Summer Intern Students.
Co-Charing [**UIST 2022 SIC**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c1i7YrR3ZKo) with Thijs Rouman (Ultrasound Levitation Kit).
Visited [**Seoul National University**](https://en.snu.ac.kr/) (to see Inrak Choi).
Attended [**SIGCHI Korea**](https://2022summer.sigchi.kr/) Summer Event at the University of Seoul.
Invited Talk at [**KAIST**](https://hci.kaist.ac.kr/) (hosted by Andrea Bianchi and Juho Kim).
Presented [**AR and Robotics Taxonomy**](https://ilab.ucalgary.ca/ar-and-robotics/) paper at [**CHI 2022**](https://chi2022.acm.org/) in New Orleans.
Invited Talk at [**Microsoft Research EPIC Group**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/group/epic/) in Redmond (hosted by Ken Hinckley).
Invited Talk at [**CU Boulder ATLAS**](https://www.colorado.edu/atlas/) (hosted by Ellen Yi-Luen Do and Mark Gross).
Presented **RealitySketch** at [**SIGGRAPH Asia 2021 Real-time Live!**](https://sa2021.siggraph.org/en/attend/real-time-live/6/sessions) in front of thousands of audience.
Samin Farajian won [**UIST 2021**](https://uist.acm.org/uist2021/) [**Best Student Innovation Contest Award**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R98vR3tukMY)
Joining the [**University of Calgary**](https://www.ucalgary.ca/) as an Assisatnat Professor in CS and [**HCI Group**](https://ilab.cpsc.ucalgary.ca/) starting in Winter 2021.
**[PhD Defense](https://ryosuzuki.org/phd-thesis) ... and Passed! :)** (committee: D Leithinger, M Gross, T Yeh, H Ishii, T Igarashi)
Traveling for on-site job interviews (UW, UCSB, Boston, Virginia Tech, Calgary)
Traveling to Boston to visit **MIT CSAIL** and **Media Lab**
Became a **PhD candidate** (committee: D Leithinger, M Gross, T Yeh, H Ishii, T Igarashi, E Do)
One [**UIST 2019**](http://uist.acm.org/uist2019/) poster and and doctoral consortium paper are accepted.
I will serve as a web and social media chair for [**UIST 2016**](http://uist.acm.org/uist2016/)
The very first day of starting my HCI research (mentor: [**Koji Yatani**](http://iis-lab.org/member/koji-yatani/))
